title: FPS extremely dropping
body: I think after patch 6.22 my fps drop is fast. it mean after client updated the game is unstable in game, i tried to low my setting but it's not problem. How can i fix it?

replies.body:
Sorry but i used AMD Video Card, it work perfect until Patch 6.23 updated and new client crash my FPS even i changed my setting All Low

CPU : i7-3770K
RAM : 8 GB
VGA : RX 390

I re-intall my window, update new driver from amd, reintall LoL. Disable DVR on Xbox app. disable G-syn, even sent the support ticket and hextech log. I did everything but It's not fixed
I had thought this was on my end since yesterday, But now I'm realizing that everyone seems to be having FPS issues post 6.23

I'll need some more information in order to assist you, as there are a few current issues out there causing low FPS. Some players using G-Sync displays have reported that turning off G-Sync has resolved their FPS issues. Other players are using the Nvidia **375.xx** drivers, which have been causing unstable FPS. If you're running this driver, I *strongly recommend* rolling back to an [earlier driver](http://www.nvidia.com/Download/Find.aspx?lang=en-us) or one of the newer **376.xx** drivers.

Let me know if you have any questions.

I've been experiencing split second FPS drops. I recently upgraded my graphic drivers, and Nvidia drivers are well known to often be unstable, so I'm trying to see if that might be the cause. Are you experiencing the same type of FPS drops, and do you have an Nvidia graphics card, and if so, which drivers are you using?
